name: Alien Attack (Markt & Technik)
overview: Set in 2439 the aliens, once again, want to conquer the universe. Not again! in any case, Tassilo Schütz wants to make your wife a game widow with this shooter, it's a real blast. The aliens have almost succeeded in conquering it, except for one small one blue planet that the earthlings are still successfully defending. But the Aliens are not absolutely crazy, they simply occupy the planet Keftac, and they are hoping that a very important food source for the people, because on the earth itself nothing grows anymore. A game Tassilo Schütz, published in 64'er 1991/09.
